title.narrative: Strengthening social and environmental risk management via Not for Profits and Civil Society organisations

description.narrative: This activity (Strengthening social and environmental risk management via Not for Profits and Civil Society organisations) is a component of Responsible Accountable and Transparent Enterprise - RATE reported by FCDO, with a funding type of 'Not for profit organisation' and a budget of £27,808,957. This component benefits Developing countries, unspecified, and works in the following sector(s): Business Policy and Administration, Trade policy and administrative management. , with the following implementing partners: B Lab, Business Fights Poverty, Ethical Trading Initiative, Global Reporting Initiative, Humanity United, ISEAL Alliance, ShareAction , Shift, The British Academy, The Fairtrade Foundation, United Nations Foundation, World Benchmarking Alliance. The start date is 17-08-2014 and the end date is 31-03-2020.

owner-org.narrative: UK - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office (FCDO)

mailing-address.narrative: Public Enquiry Point, Abercrombie House, Eaglesham Road, East Kilbride, Glasgow G75 8EA

description.narrative: General Economic, Commercial and Labour Affairs - Economic Affairs - General Economic, Commercial and Labour Affairs - investment promotion
